knimeNode.name: Value Selection QuickForm (legacy)
knimeNode.shortDescription: Takes a data table and a selected column and returns a variable with the selected value from this column.

intro.p: Takes a data table and a selected column and returns a variable with the selected value from this column. The selection can also be controlled from a quickfrom (WebPortal).

fullDescription.option: A descriptive label that will be shown in, for instance the web port.
Some lines of description that will be shown in the remote control form, for instance by means of a tooltip.

A weight value that influences the position of the component in the final layout. Lighter elements will be placed at the top, whereas heavier items will be placed nearer the bottom. The value is relative to the weights of the other components in the workflow (absolute value is not relevant, only the relative comparison to other elements).
Variable value containing the select column names.
Column Selection panel to select a single column from.
If selected the column is locked and cannot be selected in WebPortal wizard execution.
Value Selection panel to select a single value from.

ports.inPort: A table to select a values from a column.
ports.outPort: Variable output (string) with the selected value name.
